_sText:
cs_motel88.txt Read Me
-------------------------

CONTENTS

 1.Whats in the .zip file?
 2.Installation
 3.Description
 4.Notes/errors
 5.Author and acknowledgments
-------------------------

1.Whats in the .zip file

2x Folders with:
 1x ReadMe.txt(obviously:)
 ---1x cs_motel88.bsp map file
 ---1x cs_motel88.nav map file
 ---6x in-game Screen shots

-------------------------

2.Installation:
  
      Just place or extract the cstrike folder into your Counter-Strike: Source directory. For example place the files in these directories: "C:\Program Files/Steam/steamapps/"your user name"/counter-strike source/cstrike/maps/" 

!!!!P.S. Open this "cstrike" folder, and then extract the contens inside of it, i,e; the "maps folder" into STEAMS original folder named "cstrike," other wise it will place this "cstrike folder" inside your "cstrike folder."!!!! 
-------------------------

3.Description:

   This is my first attempt at making a high rise map for Counter-Strike: Source. It was meant to be a Hostage Rescue map but the hosties won't make it all the way down to the lobby where the rescue zones. They get caught up on the stairs some how, I don't know why, and I don't know how to fix these problem yet. So, you can try and lead them out or just play it as a Deathmatch or Fight Yard I guess. The concept came to me as a hotel from another country(I'm from the U.S.A. BTW.) Its no place specific i,e; this motel/hotel doesn't exist or far as I know it doesn't(I've never been out of the U.S.A.) I just kind a pieced it all together a little at a time. Any ways, there is no LIGHTING as I can't get the lights to illuminate the bottom floors appropriately. So there is only the default engine lighting right now.    

-------------------------

4.Notes/errors:

 a.Lighting sucks and I apologize, but so do my lighting skills. =P 

 b.Brushes and textures are still not aligned and/or might be slightly out of place and size.

 c.This map has the standard CS:S load out with the VGUI buy screens.
 
 d.There are 8vs8 CT and T spawning's, so there is 16 spawns in all. And Bots do have      info_nodes.
 
 -------------------------

5.Author and Acknowledgments:

 + Map by: Chase"ArrogantOrange"Miller

 + Tutorials and training provided by: 3kliksphilip You can find him and his tutorials on          YouTube at http://www.youtube.com/user/3kliksphilip

 + A big thanx to Valve(obviously)for their great games and the SOURCE SDK(and other versions) 

 + and as always to the Mapers/Moders like you who give me a reason to keep chugging a way at    this designing dream...thingy, I have =)

  Thanx FBSBanana.  
  
    Sincerely,
  Arrogant Orange
-------------------------
-------------------------
-------------------------
-------------------------
